wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I also am so hockey is back on the ice. I am little pissed at what the new CBA has done to my Red Wings but I am sure we will manage. Some of the new rule changes are nice as well. Long overdue. Some are just plain dumb. As a goalie I want to skate where i want. I would have rather let them check the goalie outside the box then limit where they can skate and handle the puck
